mapper.sql: id, status, login_name, password, role, tgroup, name, email, telephone
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
status,
login_name,
password,
role,
tgroup,
name,
email,
telephone,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{tgroup,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update user
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
tgroup = #{tgroup,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tgroup = #{tgroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
